backToComments.description: Appears above reply modal for featured content.

banConfirmation.default: Are you sure you want to ban this user?

commentCountLabel.description: Comment count label if there is 1 comment.

commentCountLabelPlural.description: Comment count label if there is more than 1 comment.

commentCountLabelZero.description: Comment count label if there are no comments.

commentTombstone.description: Message displayed on deleted content that has visible replies.

customHtmlDialogTitle.description: Appears as the header for the modal.

deleteButton.description: Button allowing user to delete comment -- Available only for authors and moderators, if enabled.

deleteCommentTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on hover of delete button.

displayName.description: Display name of the authenticated user.

displayNameGuest.description: Display name of the guest user.

editButton.description: Button allowing user to edit comment -- Available only for authors and moderators, if enabled.

editProfile.description: Link that navigates to the authenticated user's edit profile page.

editProfileAriaLabel.description: Accessibility string for the edit profile link.

editorDisabled.default: This conversation is currently closed to new comments.
editorDisabled.description: Message shown when the conversation has commenting disabled.

errorAlreadyPosted.default: You can only post one review.

errorAuthError.default: You're not authorized to post a review on this conversation

errorCommentsNotAllowed.default: Reviews cannot be posted at this time

errorDefault.default: An error has occurred. Please try again.

errorDislikeOwnComment.default: You cannot dislike your own review

errorDuplicate.default: As much as you liked your review, you're not allowed to post it twice.

errorEditDuplicate.default: You must change the body of the review when you edit it.

errorEditNotAllowed.default: You're not allowed to edit reviews on this conversation.

errorEditTimeExceeded.default: Sorry, your review editing period has expired.

errorEmpty.default: It seems you're attempting to post an empty review.

errorEmptyTitle.default: It seems you're attempting to post an empty title

errorExpired.default: Your session has expired. Please reload the page.

errorGuestLiked.default: Sorry, only those with accounts can like content.

errorInvalidChar.default: It seems you're attempting to post an invalid character.

errorLikeOwnComment.default: You cannot like your own comment

errorMalformed.default: It seems you're attempting to post malformed content.

errorMaxChars.default: Sorry, your review is too long. Please edit and try again.

errorRatingEmpty.default: You cannot submit an empty rating

errorRatingNotValid.default: The rating must be an object

errorShowMore.default: There was an error loading more reviews.

errorTitleMaxChars.default: Sorry, your title is too long. Please edit and try again.

errorVoteOwnComment.default: You cannot vote on your own review

featuredCommentsTag.description: Number of featured comments -- Exactly 1 featured comment.

featuredCommentsTitlePlural.description: Number of featured comments -- More than 1 featured comment.

flagButton.description: Button that opens the flag comment modal.

flagCommentTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on hover of flag button.

hovercardViewProfile.description: Button on hovercard that shows the user's profile.

likeButton.description: Button allowing user to like a comment.

likesPlural.description: Number of likes a comment has received -- More than 1 like.

likesSingular.description: Number of likes a comment has received -- Exactly 1 like.

listenerCount.description: Number of users listening to the conversation -- 1 user listening.

listenerCountPlural.description: Number of users listening to the conversation -- More than 1 user listening.

mentionDefaultText.default: I mentioned you in a Livefyre review!

mentionErrorGeneral.default: Oops! Something went wrong! Livefyre has been alerted.

mentionErrorNoneSelected.default: You must have at least one mention enabled.

mentionMenuTitle.default: To see and mention your friends

moderator.description: Tag shown on comments when the author is a moderator.

moderatorEditTimestamp.description: Timestamp displayed on comments that were edited by a moderator.

modqAriaLabel.description: Accessibility string for the moderation queue link.

MultipleMediaNotAllowedError.default: Your permissions only grant you one media attachment at a time.

newComment.description: There is a single new comment hidden by high velocity.

newComments.description: There is more than 1 new comment hidden by high velocity.

newReplies.description: There is more than 1 new reply hidden by high velocity.

newReply.description: There is 1 new reply hidden by high velocity.

notificationSettings.description: Link that navigates to the authenticated user's notification settings.

permalinkNotFoundMsg.default: This comment is no longer visible.
permalinkNotFoundMsg.description: Message displayed when the requested permalink comment is no longer visible.

postAsButton.description: Post a comment button -- Available for unauthenticated users.

postButton.description: Post a comment button -- Available for logged in users.

refresh.description: Reload the page to get the latest content.

replyButton.description: Button allowing user to reply to a comment.

replyButtonPlural.description: ?? -- Available for Chat and Live Blog.

replyButtonSingular.description: ?? -- Available for Chat and Live Blog.

reviewsContentNotFoundMsg.default: This review is no longer visible

shareButton.description: Button allowing user to share a comment.

shareCommentTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on hover of share button.

shareText.default: I just wrote a review. Check it out!

showMore.description: Button that loads more content at the bottom of the stream.

signIn.description: Link to open the authentication modal.

signInAriaLabel.description: Accessibility string for the sign in link.

signInGuest.default: Sign in or Post as Guest
signInGuest.description: Link to open the authentication modal.

signOut.description: Link that signs the authenticated user out.

signOutAriaLabel.description: Accessibility string for the log out link.

siteAdmin.description: Link that navigates to network's Studio section.

siteAdminAriaLabel.description: Accessibility string for the site admin link.

sortNewest.description: Sort the stream of content by newest first.

sortOldest.description: Sort the stream of content by oldest first.

streamRefreshMsg.description: Link to refresh the stream and immediately go to newest first sorting.

streamSorting.description: Text that shows when the sort order is changing.

unlikeButton.description: Button allowing user to remove the like they previously gave to a comment.

userMenuAriaLabel.description: Accessibility string for the down arrow that toggles the user menu.

viewProfileAriaLabel.description: Accessibility string for the view profile link.
